original: I arrive at Moxie's wagon, and let her know that Riku will be a guest tonight. I don't mention the threesome, but Moxie's pervy enough to anticipate that.
Hey [playername], I just got a magic mail from Moxie, she wants you to go and see her urgently!
Urgently? Sure, see you later Butters.
U-Uhm, y-you're leaving?
Well, yeah. It's urgent.
Darn, I'll just masturbate or something then...
[playername] [playername]! I just got a magic mail from Princess Selene!
A-And you got one too!
Awesome, what’s it about?
She wants to interview me!
Here, read yours.
Hmm… She wants to see me as soon as possible, I guess it’s too important for a normal letter?
Ohh, uhm. I dunno?
When should I go see her?
It has to be the evening, she’s nocturnal, so around midnight.
Oh right? Should I go tonight? I’ve already done quite a lot today.
If I were in your position, I’d already be walking out the wagon.
But it’s not even that late, you’d be arriving hours early.
Exactly, hours early! I love Selene so much.
Okay, I’ll go tonight.
Hmm... Okay, but don't keep her waiting!
When I arrive home, Moxie is already in bed. I snuggle up with her and soon doze off.
When I arrive home, Butters is already in bed. I snuggle up with her and soon doze off.
